Feature: Display Category 3 MAR Status for each of the Radiation Facilities
Description: A capability must be provided to display Category 3 MAR status for each building.

Feature: Display Category IV Physical Security Status for each of the MBAs
Description: A capability must be provided to display Category IV Physical Security status for each MBA.
A capability must be provided to confirm source inventory.  Note: An inventory of all registered sources is required by the Department of Energy (DOE) every six months.
